info.name: Global Roboto
info.description:
Simply changes every font everywhere to Roboto. Beware: this may include the browser. That may or may not be a good thing for you.

Requires the Roboto font: http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/roboto
info.additionalInfo:
1.1:
No longer uses !important. This means that some sites may not be completely changed, but it also means that it won't break icon fonts such as Font Awesome.
